TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ControlAdapter extends System.Object

summary.span: 為附加配置器的衍生控制項自訂呈現方式，以針對特定瀏覽器修改預設標記或行為，而且此類別為所有控制項配置器繼承來源的基底類別。

span.span: Customizes rendering for the derived control to which the adapter is attached, to modify the default markup or behavior for specific browsers, and is the base class from which all control adapters inherit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項配接器是可覆寫特定元件類別中，允許瀏覽器或標記特定處理其執行存留週期方法和事件。Control adapters are components that override certain class methods and events in its execution lifecycle to allow browser or markup-specific handling. .NET Framework 對應至單一衍生的控制項配接器針對每個用戶端要求的物件。The .NET Framework maps a single derived control adapter to a object for each client request. 配接器會修改特定瀏覽器或瀏覽器類別的控制項，或做為某些功能的任何篩選器。An adapter modifies a control for a specific browser or class of browsers or acts as an arbitrary filter on some capability. 通常由瀏覽器 （例如，XHTML 或 HTML 3.2） 所使用的標記語言定義配接器。Typically the adapter is defined by the markup language that the browser uses (for example, XHTML or HTML 3.2). 大部分的轉譯行為適應性可以封裝在特製化類別衍生自類別。Much of the adaptability in rendering behavior can be encapsulated in the specialized classes that derive from the class. 因此，很可能在單一配接器可以用於多個瀏覽器類別行為或在適應性該納入類別可以讓控制項配接器使用非必要。Therefore, it is likely that a single adapter can be used for a number of browser class behaviors or that inclusion of the adaptability in the classes could make the use of a control adapter unnecessary. 控制項類別的配接器適用於所有控制項都繼承自該類別，除非更具特製化的介面卡。An adapter for a control class applies to all controls that inherit from that class, unless more specialized adapters are present. 例如，針對配接器類別可用於所有`Validator`物件。For example, an adapter for the class can be used for all `Validator` objects. 配接器通常不會繼承直接從但其中的目標特定配接器基底類別可提供其他功能的控制項類型和目標瀏覽器專用的類別，或需要特定的轉譯。Adapters typically do not inherit directly from the class, but from one of the target-specific adapter base classes that provide additional functionality specific to the control type and target browser or the particular rendering required. 控制項本身不一定需要配接器。Controls themselves do not necessarily require an adapter. 如果控制項可以透過撰寫擴充，通常已足夠子控制項配接器。If controls are extended through composition, generally the child control adapters are sufficient. 每個控制項具有明確對應到配接器透過.browser 定義檔案。Each control has explicit mappings to adapters through the .browser definition files. 因此，任何存取屬性使用從對控制項的介面卡的對應執行查閱的瀏覽器定義檔案中擷取的物件。Thus, any access to the property uses the object extracted from the browser definition files to perform the lookup for the mapping of the adapter to control. 在處理期間，.NET Framework 會攔截可能是特定目標控制項的可覆寫方法的呼叫。During processing, the .NET Framework intercepts calls to the overridable methods of a control that could be target-specific. 如果附加控制項配接器，.NET Framework 會呼叫相關聯的配接器方法。If a control adapter is attached, the .NET Framework calls the associated adapter methods. 配接器會透過控制項執行轉譯方法。The adapter performs rendering for the control through the method. 如果覆寫，可能不應該呼叫基底類別實作，以回到上執行的呼叫，因為方法。If overridden, potentially should not call the base class implementation because that performs a call back on the method. 這可能會發生兩次，一次是由配接器，另一次是由控制項的轉譯。This might cause the rendering to occur twice, once by the adapter and once by the control. 基礎方法呼叫控制項的方法。The base method calls back on the method of the control. 因此，如果您覆寫，您不應該呼叫基底類別實作，除非您實作轉譯除了係由的控制項。Thus, if you override , you should not call the base class implementation unless the rendering you implement is in addition to that provided by of the control. 您必須確定.NET Framework 執行攔截，介面卡的子控制項。You must ensure that the .NET Framework performs interception for adapters of the child controls. 您可以藉由呼叫基底方法，這個方法會呼叫方法的控制項，從您覆寫。You can do this by calling the base method, which calls the method of the control, from your override. 和由控制項呼叫方法之前和之後 （分別） 控制呼叫方法。The and methods are called by the control immediately before and after (respectively) the control calls the method. 如果前置和後置轉譯唯一的瀏覽器特定處理工作所需使用和可能會導致不必要的覆寫。If pre- and post-rendering are the only browser-specific processing tasks required, using and might make it unnecessary to override . 預設行為和方法是呼叫的對應方法。The default behavior of the and methods is to call the corresponding methods of the . 若要維持其本身的狀態資訊，可以覆寫控制項配接器， ， ，和方法。To maintain its own state information, a control adapter can override the , , , and methods. ， ，和私用的控制項和檢視狀態儲存並分別載入時所呼叫。, , , and are called when the private control and view states are saved and loaded, respectively. ， ， ，和base 方法呼叫傳回在相對應類別方法。The , , , and base methods call back on the corresponding class methods. 因此，任何一項都會覆寫的方法必須呼叫其基底的方法; 否則此事件相關聯類別方法不會引發。Thus, any of these methods that are overridden must call their base methods; otherwise, the event associated with the class method will not be raised. 選擇性地實作控制項和配接器和介面。Controls and adapters optionally implement the and interfaces. .NET Framework 會決定配接器是否存在以及是否配接器實作這些介面。The .NET Framework determines whether an adapter exists and whether the adapter implements these interfaces. 若是如此，配接器應該覆寫， ，和視的方法。If it does, the adapter should override the , , and methods, as necessary. 如果無法辨識的回傳資料配接器中，它必須回呼來處理在控制項上。If the postback data is not recognized in the adapter, it must call back on the control to process it. 後續的事件處理常式也必須回呼控制項上。Subsequent event handlers also must call back on the control.

block.para:
當您繼承自類別，需要一般配接器功能的控制項應該有對應的配接器基底類別，在模式中名為 (例如， )。
When you inherit from the class, a control that requires general adapter functionality should have a corresponding adapter base class, named in the pattern (for example, ).
配接器應該至少傳回強型別執行個體控制透過其屬性。
The adapter should at a minimum return a strongly-typed instance of the control through its property.
1. 控制配接器，針對指定的控制項類型和標記語言，應該在模式中名為 (例如， )。Control adapters for a given control type and markup language should be named in the pattern (for example, ).控制項的配接器應該在實作subnamespace。Adapters for a control should be implemented in an subnamespace.控制項配接器應該繼承自適當的基底類別，並遵循相同的繼承模型為控制項。Control adapters should inherit from the appropriate base class and follow the same inheritance model as the control.例如，從繼承的控制項配接器基底類別應該繼承自類別或相關類別。For example, an adapter for a control inheriting from the base class should inherit from either the class or the relevant class.特製化的控制項下的所有裝置節點.browser 組態檔中應定義任何特製化的介面卡。Any specialized adapters should be defined for the specialized control under all of the device nodes in configuration .browser files.確認已連接的介面卡，或附加配接器實作特定介面，不應該假設適當實作的控制項。A properly implemented control should not assume that an adapter is attached, or that the attached adapter implements a specific interface.相反地，它應該先檢查這些呼叫。Instead, it should check for these before calling.很可能模擬這類覆寫在控制項中，受保護的事件方法方法。It is possible to simulate overriding protected event methods in the control, such as the method of the .首先，建立使用配接器類別OnClick方法。First, create an adapter class with an OnClick method.然後建立新的控制項衍生自並覆寫方法。Then create a new control derived from and override the method.已覆寫方法呼叫OnClick配接器的方法。The overriden method calls the OnClick method of the adapter.配接器物件是透過受保護屬性類別。The adapter object is available through the protected property of the class.控制項的屬性是沒有相關聯的配接器時，因此任何程式碼應該檢查該條件才可以呼叫方法的介面卡。The property of the control is when there is no associated adapter, so any code should check for that condition before calling methods of the adapter.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 內部建構此配接器，它會建立對應時物件。The .NET Framework internally constructs this adapter when it creates the corresponding object.

param.name: writer
param.span: 包含呈現特定目標輸出方法的 。

span.span: The containing methods to render the target-specific output.

summary.span: 在呈現控制項之前呼叫。

span.span: Called prior to the rendering of a control.

summary.span: 在衍生的配置器類別中，產生特定目標所需的開頭標記 (而非 HTML 瀏覽器所需)。

span.span: In a derived adapter class, generates opening tags that are required by a specific target but not needed by HTML browsers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫之前方法，並用來執行特定目標的前置處理控制項的呈現之前。The method is called just before the method, and is used to perform target-specific preprocessing before the rendering of the control. 使用方法搭配方法，以確保開頭和結尾標記的一致性。Use the method in combination with the method to ensure opening and closing tag consistency.

para.span: 當您繼承自類別基底方法呼叫方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, the base method calls the method.

para.span: 因此，會覆寫的方法應該呼叫基底方法，只有當它處理，而不是而不是方法。

span.span: Thus, overrides of the method should call the base method only if its processing is in addition to, rather than instead of, the method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities Browser { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities Browser
Protected ReadOnly Property Browser As HttpBrowserCapabilities
protected: property System::Web::HttpBrowserCapabilities ^ Browser { System::Web::HttpBrowserCapabilities ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得對用戶端瀏覽器功能的參考 (此用戶端是發出目前 HTTP 要求的用戶端)。

span.span: Gets a reference to the browser capabilities of the client making the current HTTP request.

value.span: ，指定用戶端瀏覽器和標記功能。

span.span: An specifying client browser and markup capabilities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件可判斷從用戶端瀏覽器功能所傳回的物件屬性。A object determines the client browser capabilities from the object that is returned by the property. 這可讓物件來呈現瀏覽器特定標記，或修改的行為。This enables the object to render browser-specific markup or otherwise modify the behavior of the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來存取要求的瀏覽器的詳細資料。The following code example shows how to use the property to access the details of the requesting browser. 在此範例中，程式碼會檢查以判斷是否瀏覽器相容於 JavaScript 中，然後讓開發人員在此情況下呈現自訂的輸出。In this example, the code checks to determine whether the browser is compatible with JavaScript, and then allows the developer to render customized output in that case. [!code-cpp[ControlAdapter_Browser#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter_Browser/CPP/controladapter_browser.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlAdapter_Browser#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter_Browser/CS/controladapter_browser.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlAdapter_Browser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter_Browser/VB/controladapter_browser.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected System.Web.UI.Control Control { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.Control Control
Protected ReadOnly Property Control As Control
protected: property System::Web::UI::Control ^ Control { System::Web::UI::Control ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得控制項的參考 (指控制項配置器附加的控制項)。

span.span: Gets a reference to the control to which this control adapter is attached.
The to which this is attached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當在衍生的控制項配接器附加至控制項時，.NET Framework 會呼叫特定配接器成員，而不是控制項的成員。When a derived control adapter is attached to a control, the .NET Framework calls certain adapter members instead of the control members. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生的自訂控制項類別，並再建立對應的配接器，繼承自類別。The following code example shows how to derive a custom control from the class, and then create a corresponding adapter that inherits from the class. 配接器會覆寫屬性，並傳回控制項的強型別參考。The adapter overrides the property and returns a strongly-typed reference to the control. [!code-cpp[ControlAdapter.Control#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter.Control/CPP/controladapter.control.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlAdapter.Control#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter.Control/CS/controladapter.control.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlAdapter.Control#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter.Control/VB/controladapter.control.vb#1)]

para.span: 當您繼承自類別，最少，您應該實作屬性來傳回強型別執行個體控制項的範例 > 一節中所示。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, at a minimum, you should implement a property to return a strongly-typed instance of the control, as shown in the Example section.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void CreateChildControls ();
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void CreateChildControls() cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub CreateChildControls ()
protected public: virtual void CreateChildControls();

summary.span: 為複合控制項建立特定目標的子控制項。

span.span: Creates the target-specific child controls for a composite control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有衍生的控制項配接器會附加到物件和會覆寫方法，而不是呼叫覆寫方法。If there is a derived control adapter attached to a object and the method is overridden, the override is called instead of the method. 因此，可以用來建立特定目標的子控制項集合。Thus, can be used to create a target-specific child control set. 如需結合控制項來建立新的控制項的詳細資訊，請參閱[複合控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb174677-d845-467c-8bf3-cc096b2490b0)。For more information about combining controls to create a new control, see [Composite Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fb174677-d845-467c-8bf3-cc096b2490b0).

para.span: 如果您建立繼承的類別並覆寫方法時，請勿呼叫基底方法，除非您想要將控制項加入至這些方法所建立的基底。

span.span: If you create an inheriting class and override the method, do not call the base method unless you want to add controls to those created by the base method.

para.span: 否則您無法建立兩個集合的子控制項。

span.span: Otherwise you could create two sets of child controls.

span.span: In a derived adapter class, generates closing tags that are required by a specific target but not needed by HTML browsers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後立即呼叫方法方法，以及用來呈現控制項之後，執行特定目標的後置處理。The method is called just after the method, and is used to perform target-specific postprocessing after the rendering of the control. 使用方法搭配方法，以確保開頭和結尾標記的一致性。Use the method in combination with the method to ensure opening and closing tag consistency.

para.span: 當您繼承自類別基底方法呼叫方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, the base method calls the method.

para.span: 因此，會覆寫的方法應該呼叫基底方法，只有當它處理，而不是而不是方法。

span.span: Thus, overrides of the method should call the base method only if its processing is in addition to, rather than instead of, the method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void LoadAdapterControlState (object state);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void LoadAdapterControlState(object state) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub LoadAdapterControlState (state As Object)
protected public: virtual void LoadAdapterControlState(System::Object ^ state);

param.name: state
param.span: ，包含做為 的配置器控制狀態資訊。

span.span: An that contains the adapter's control state information as a .

summary.span: 載入之前在對頁面發出要求的期間由 所儲存的配置器控制項狀態資訊 (與此控制項配置器相關聯的控制項便存在於此頁面中)。

span.span: Loads adapter control state information that was saved by during a previous request to the page where the control associated with this control adapter resides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項狀態是即使已停用檢視狀態所需的基本狀態資訊。Control state is the essential state information needed even if view state is disabled. 當配接器需要維護自己的控制項狀態資訊時，它可以覆寫和方法。When an adapter needs to maintain its own control state information, it can override the and methods. 配接器可能需要的功能，必須先要求，針對關聯控制項的狀態分開維護的狀態時，維持控制項狀態資訊。An adapter might need to maintain control state information when there are features that need to have state maintained across requests, independent from the state of the associated control. 例如，大型的文字顯示和一群組成複合控制項控制項可能會呈現為單一的桌上型電腦瀏覽器檢視。For example, a composite control consisting of a large textual display and a group of controls might render as a single view on desktop computer browsers. 在其他瀏覽器，它可能會分隔其轉譯，用於文字顯示，選項按鈕群組的另一個檢視。On other browsers, it might split its rendering—one view for the textual display and the other for the radio button group. 配接器需要維護自己特定目標的相關資訊的目前作用中的檢視。The adapter would need to maintain its own target-specific information about the currently active view. 方法之後，立即呼叫方法，請在`LoadState`生命週期階段。The method is called immediately after the method, in the `LoadState` lifecycle stage. 配接器控制狀態是分離的而且除了控制項的控制項狀態。The adapter control state is separate and in addition to the control state of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void LoadAdapterViewState (object state);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void LoadAdapterViewState(object state) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub LoadAdapterViewState (state As Object)
protected public: virtual void LoadAdapterViewState(System::Object ^ state);

param.name: state
param.span: ，包含當做 的配置器檢視狀態資訊。

span.span: An that contains the adapter view state information as a .

summary.span: 載入之前在對頁面發出要求的期間由 所儲存的配置器檢視狀態資訊 (與此控制項配置器相關聯的控制項便存在於此頁面中)。

span.span: Loads adapter view state information that was saved by during a previous request to the page where the control associated with this control adapter resides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當配接器需要維護自己的檢視狀態資訊時，它可以覆寫和方法。When an adapter needs to maintain its own view state information, it can override the and methods. 配接器必須維護資料所必須維持在要求中，獨立於針對關聯控制項的檢視狀態時的檢視狀態資訊。An adapter needs to maintain view state information when there is data that must be maintained across requests, independent from the view state of the associated control. 比方說，在桌面的電腦瀏覽器上的方格控制項可能會呈現為單一檢視的資料列和資料行的值。For example, a grid control on desktop computer browsers might render as a single view of rows and columns of values. 在其他瀏覽器，它可能會分隔其轉譯為多個不同的檢視，例如資料列和詳細資料的單一資料列的清單。On other browsers, it might split its rendering into multiple separate views, such as a list of rows and details of a single row. 配接器必須維持的目前都沒有作用中檢視狀態的檢視資料。The adapter would need to maintain the data for the views that are not currently active in view state. 方法之前，立即呼叫方法中的`LoadState`生命週期階段。The method is called immediately before the method in the `LoadState` lifecycle stage. 配接器檢視狀態是分離的而且除了控制項的檢視狀態。The adapter view state is separate and in addition to the view state of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void OnInit (EventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnInit(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub OnInit (e As EventArgs)
protected public: virtual void OnInit(EventArgs ^ e);

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 為關聯控制項覆寫 方法。

span.span: Overrides the method for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有配接器會附加到物件和會覆寫方法，而不是呼叫覆寫方法方法。If there is an adapter attached to a object and the method is overridden, the override method is called instead of the method. 覆寫執行中的特定目標處理`Initialize`控制項週期的階段。Override to perform target-specific processing in the `Initialize` stage of the control lifecycle. 一般來說，這些是在建立控制項時執行的函式。Typically, these are functions that are performed when a control is created. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是衍生的自訂控制項配接器從類別。The following code sample derives a custom control adapter from the class. 它接著會覆寫方法相關聯的控制項上設定屬性，並呼叫基底方法，以完成初始化控制項。It then overrides the method to set a property on the associated control and call the base method to complete the control initialization. [!code-cpp[ControlAdapter_OnInit#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter_OnInit/CPP/controladapter_oninit.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlAdapter_OnInit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter_OnInit/CS/controladapter_oninit.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlAdapter_OnInit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlAdapter_OnInit/VB/controladapter_oninit.vb#1)]

para.span: 當您繼承自類別和介面卡覆寫方法時，配接器必須呼叫對應的基底類別方法，也就會呼叫方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class and the adapter overrides the method, the adapter must call the corresponding base class method, which in turn calls the method.

para.span: 如果不會呼叫方法，不會引發事件。

span.span: If the method is not called, the event will not be raised.

summary.span: 為關聯控制項覆寫 方法。

span.span: Overrides the method for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有配接器會附加到物件和會覆寫方法，而不是呼叫覆寫方法方法。If there is an adapter attached to a object and the method is overridden, the override method is called instead of the method. 覆寫方法，以執行中的特定目標處理`Load`控制項週期的階段。Override the method to perform target-specific processing in the `Load` stage of the control lifecycle. 一般來說，這些是應該為每個用戶端要求執行的函式。Typically, these are functions that should be performed for each client request.

para.span: 當您繼承自類別和介面卡覆寫方法時，配接器必須呼叫對應的基底類別方法，也就會呼叫方法。

summary.span: 為關聯控制項覆寫 方法。

span.span: Overrides the method for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有配接器會附加到物件和會覆寫方法，而不是呼叫覆寫方法方法。If there is an adapter attached to a object and the method is overridden, the override method is called instead of the method. 覆寫方法，以執行中的特定目標處理`PreRender`控制項週期的階段。Override the method to perform target-specific processing in the `PreRender` stage of the control lifecycle. 一般來說，這些是緊接在之前的控制輸出轉譯的函式。Typically, these are functions that immediately precede rendering of the control output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果沒有配接器會附加到物件和會覆寫方法，而不是呼叫覆寫方法方法。If there is an adapter attached to a object and the method is overridden, the override method is called instead of the method. 覆寫方法執行特定目標處理`Unload`控制項週期的階段。Override the method to do target-specific processing in the `Unload` stage of the control lifecycle. 一般來說，這些是配置控制項的前面清除函式。Typically, these are cleanup functions that precede disposition of the control.

summary.span: 取得對頁面的參考 (與此配置器相關聯的控制項便存在於此頁面中)。

span.span: Gets a reference to the page where the control associated with this adapter resides.

value.span: ，可提供頁面執行個體的存取 (相關聯的控制項便存在於此執行個體中)。

span.span: A that provides access to the page instance where the associated control is situated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可存取其中平均分攤工作量控制項的物件。The property provides access to the object where the control is situated.

summary.span: 取得對此頁的頁面配置器的參考 (關聯的控制項便存在於此頁面中)。

span.span: Gets a reference to the page adapter for the page where the associated control resides.

value.span: 頁面的 ，與目前 相關聯的控制項便存在於此頁面中。

span.span: A for the page where the control associated with the current is situated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可存取物件物件其中目前相關聯的物件物件平均分攤工作量。The property provides access to the object for the object where the object associated with the current object is situated. 屬性可以用來存取層級頁面配接器，例如可以套用到幾個頁面上的控制項類型的一般特定目標函數的其他項目。The property can be used to access other items at the page adapter level, such as common target-specific functions that could apply to several control types on the page.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void Render (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);

Protected Friend Overridable Sub Render (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
protected public: virtual void Render(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

span.span: The to use to render the target-specific output.

summary.span: 為附加控制項配接器的控制項，產生目標特定的標記。

span.span: Generates the target-specific markup for the control to which the control adapter is attached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫方法來產生用戶端瀏覽器所傳送的特定目標的標記。Override the method to generate target-specific markup to send to the client browser. 方法呼叫取代方法如果物件附加至物件。The method is called in place of the method if a object is attached to a object.

para.span: 當您繼承自類別基底方法呼叫方法。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, the base method calls the method.

para.span: 因此，會覆寫的方法應該呼叫基底方法，只有當它處理，而不是而不是方法。

span.span: Thus, overrides of the method should call the base method only if its processing is in addition to, rather than instead of, the method.

para.span: 複合控制項，配接器開發人員必須確定會轉譯子控制項。

span.span: For a composite control, the adapter developer must ensure that the child controls are rendered.

para.span: 如果方法會使子系来呈現控制項，但不會產生標記，它可能適用於方法來呼叫其基底的方法。

span.span: If the method causes the child controls to be rendered but does not generate markup, it might be appropriate for the method to call its base method.

para.span: 如果有必要的子控制項的特定目標的轉譯，配接器應該實作方法，並呼叫方法從方法。

span.span: If target-specific rendering of the child controls is necessary, the adapter should implement the method and call the method from the method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void RenderChildren (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void RenderChildren(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub RenderChildren (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
protected: virtual void RenderChildren(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

span.span: The to use to render the target-specific output.

summary.span: 為複合控制項中的子控制項產生特定目標的標記 (控制項配置器會附加至此複合控制項)。

span.span: Generates the target-specific markup for the child controls in a composite control to which the control adapter is attached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫方法時必須產生目標特定的標記，子控制項集合的複合控制項，此外至個別子控制項的標記。Override the method when it is necessary to generate target-specific markup for the child control set of a composite control, in addition to the markup for the individual child controls.

para.span: 當您繼承自類別，可用於複合控制項，配接器開發人員必須確定會轉譯子控制項。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, for a composite control, the adapter developer must ensure that the child controls are rendered.

para.span: 如果配接器會覆寫方法，它應該呼叫方法的覆寫從方法。

span.span: If the adapter overrides the method, it should call the method from an override of the method.

para.span: 如果方法會使子系来呈現控制項，但本身不會產生標記，它可能適用於方法來呼叫其基底方法，呼叫方法，而不是實作的覆寫方法。

span.span: If the method causes the child controls to be rendered but itself does not generate markup, it might be appropriate for the method to call its base method, which calls the method, instead of implementing an override for the method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual object SaveAdapterControlState ();
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance object SaveAdapterControlState() cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Function SaveAdapterControlState () As Object
protected public: virtual System::Object ^ SaveAdapterControlState();

summary.span: 儲存控制項配置器的控制項狀態資訊。

span.span: Saves control state information for the control adapter.

returns.span: ，包含做為 的配置器控制狀態資訊。

span.span: An that contains the adapter's control state information as a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項狀態是即使已停用檢視狀態所需的基本狀態資訊。Control state is the essential state information needed even if view state is disabled. 當配接器需要維護自己的控制項狀態資訊時，它可以覆寫和方法。When an adapter needs to maintain its own control state information, it can override the and methods. 配接器可能需要的功能，必須先要求，針對關聯控制項的狀態分開維護的狀態時，維持控制項狀態資訊。An adapter might need to maintain control state information when there are features that need to have state maintained across requests, independent from the state of the associated control. 例如，大型的文字顯示和一群組成複合控制項控制項可能會呈現為單一的桌上型電腦瀏覽器檢視。For example, a composite control consisting of a large textual display and a group of controls might render as a single view on desktop computer browsers. 在其他瀏覽器，它可能會分隔其轉譯，用於文字顯示，選項按鈕群組的另一個檢視。On other browsers, it might split its rendering—one view for the textual display and the other for the radio button group. 配接器需要維護自己特定目標的相關資訊的目前作用中的檢視。The adapter would need to maintain its own target-specific information about the currently active view. 方法之後，立即呼叫方法中的`SaveState`生命週期階段。The method is called immediately after the method in the `SaveState` lifecycle stage. 配接器控制狀態是分離的而且除了控制項的控制項狀態。The adapter control state is separate and in addition to the control state of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual object SaveAdapterViewState ();
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance object SaveAdapterViewState() cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Function SaveAdapterViewState () As Object
protected public: virtual System::Object ^ SaveAdapterViewState();

summary.span: 儲存控制項配置器的檢視狀態資訊。

span.span: Saves view state information for the control adapter.

returns.span: ，包含當做 的配置器檢視狀態資訊。

span.span: An that contains the adapter view state information as a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當配接器需要維護自己的檢視狀態資訊時，它可以覆寫和方法。When an adapter needs to maintain its own view state information, it can override the and methods. 配接器必須維護資料所必須維持在要求中，獨立於控制項的相關聯的檢視狀態時的檢視狀態資訊。An adapter needs to maintain view state information when there is data that must be maintained across requests, independent from the associated view state of the control. 比方說，在桌面的電腦瀏覽器上的方格控制項可能會呈現為單一檢視的資料列和資料行的值。For example, a grid control on desktop computer browsers might render as a single view of rows and columns of values. 在其他瀏覽器，它可能會分隔其轉譯為多個不同的檢視，例如資料列和詳細資料的單一資料列的清單。On other browsers, it might split its rendering into multiple separate views, such as a list of rows and details of a single row. 配接器必須維持的目前都沒有作用中檢視狀態的檢視資料。The adapter would need to maintain the data for the views that are not currently active in view state. 方法之前，立即呼叫方法中的`SaveState`生命週期階段。The method is called immediately before the method in the `SaveState` lifecycle stage. 配接器檢視狀態是分離的而且除了控制項的檢視狀態。The adapter view state is separate and in addition to the view state of the control.
